settings.popup_text: Entice customers to sign up for your mailing list with discounts or exclusive offers. Include an image for extra impact.

settings.title: Example title
settings.text: Use this section to explain a set of product features, to link to a series of pages, or to answer common questions about your products. Add images for emphasis.

settings.subtitle: Impressive
settings.title: Large image and text
settings.text: Pair large text with a full-width image to draw attention to an important detail of your brand or product line.

settings.subtitle: Brand new
settings.title: Collection callout
settings.text: Use this section to easily call attention to one of your collections. We'll show photos of the first 5 products.
